desc: The ultimate tool to learn vocabs

settings.not_deletable_text: Please remove all vocabulary of this language first.
settings.confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete {lang}?

list.no_vocabs: No vocabulary found for this language!

box.empty:
It looks pretty empty here!
Start adding a vocabulary box right away:
box.name: Name
box.delete_lang: Delete all vocabulary to change the language
box.goback_: Number of compartments that are gone back on mistakes
box.delete_box_: Do you really want to delete this box forever?
box.export_: Here you can export your vocabulary box. Just select the words and share them with your friends!
box.justvocab_: Share only the individual words without publishing the top secret box
box.export_coms_: Determine whether the progress in the vocabulary trainer should be exported

com.empty: You seem to have no vocabulary in that section.

test.cancel: Do you really want to cancel the test?
test.goback_: The results of the test are deleted.

in.box_: Should the whole box be imported or just the vocabulary?
